metadata.original_prompt: Fix FastAPI route matching issue: /api/v1/synergies/stats returns 404 because parameterized route /{synergy_id} matches before specific route /stats. specific_router is defined but not accessible when module is imported. Need to ensure /stats route is matched before /{synergy_id}.
